sentences.sContent: The photograph of Christian that accompanied many of the news stories showed a boy with mussed-up hair and pierced ears with black plugs looking impishly askance at the camera.
sentences.sContent_eng: The photograph of Christian that accompanied many of the news stories showed a boy with mussed-up hair and pierced ears with black plugs looking impishly askance at the camera.
sentences.sCn: 很多新闻报道配发了一张克里斯丁本人的照片，在那幅照片中是一个头发乱糟糟的男孩，耳朵插着一个黑色的耳塞，顽皮地斜视着相机的镜头。
